#!/bin/bash -xe
yum install -y gcc-c++ make 
curl -sL https://rpm.nodesource.com/setup_6.x | bash - 
yum install -y nodejs 
yum install -y git 
yum install -y vim 
yum install -y libgcrypt 
yum install -y openssl-devel 
npm install -g babel-cli 
echo "[mongodb-org-3.4] 
name=MongoDB Repository 
baseurl=https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/7/mongodb-org/3.4/x86_64/ 
gpgcheck=0 
enabled=1 
gpgkey=https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-3.4.asc 
 
 " >> ./etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb-org-3.4.repo 
yum install -y mongodb-org 
semanage port -a -t mongod_port_t -p tcp 27017 
service mongod start

After=mongod.service 

[Service]

WorkingDirectory=/home/ec2-user/landscapes.io 
Restart=always 
RestartSec=10 
Environment=NODE_ENV=production MONGO_SEED=true PROTOCOL=http PUBLIC_IP=127.0.0.1 PORT=80 

[Install]

 " >> ./usr/lib/systemd/system/landscapes.service 
systemctl enable landscapes
